faq1.question: Is it safe for growers in Brazil?
faq1.answer: Yes. Security is our #1 priority. We don't ask for your name, ID, or personal data. All your grow information is private, encrypted, and belongs only to you.

faq2.question: Is the app free?
faq2.answer: Beta access is 100% free with no strings attached. In the future, we'll have a PRO version with advanced features, but there will always be a free plan to help you organize your grow.

faq3.question: Do I need to provide my personal data?
faq3.answer: No. Only an email is required to create your account and ensure only you can access it. Your anonymity and privacy are fundamental to us.
